courseDescription:
One of the primary reasons for the rapid rise in demand for mobile app designers is that eCommerce and other businesses have grown in size, with the number of users increasing daily. The majority of these businesses are looking for efficient app designers who can become the company's main asset with their talent and creativity. Therefore, we have designed this course to instil in you the skills to become a professional iOS mobile app designer using Sketch 3 and Swift Tableviews.

We begin this course by demonstrating how to download and install the Sketch 3 design software on your computer. We follow this with a quick overview of the design interface, layers and artboards and the various keyboard shortcuts required for design ease and speed. Next, we show you how to create a simple Facebook-style page. Learn about the different project exporting options, how to obtain resource materials from the online sketch forum, create pages, apply styles to them, transform shapes and objects and create icons. Finally, you will learn to construct an iOS app with multiple screens using Swift Tableviews.

This course is ideal for aspiring app designers who want to learn how to create iOS mobile applications from scratch or who want to brush up on their design skills. You will progress from creating a simple Facebook-like page to creating an iOS app with multiple screens using Swift Tableview. The knowledge gained from this course will set you apart from the crowd, assisting you in becoming an efficient app designer and being at the top of the game. So enrol today and be ready to design tomorrow.
